title: Examination System
purpose: End-to-end management of auditor certification examination process including purchasing, scheduling via third-party integrations (ProctorU/Calendly), delivery, results processing, and remediation logic.
business_value: Enables APSCA to manage the complete auditor certification examination lifecycle from purchase through results and remediation.

title: Auditor Lifecycle Management
purpose: Management of an auditor's journey from enrollment through certification, including status automation, level progression, and lapse/restoration logic.
business_value: Enables APSCA to manage auditor enrollment, employment, audit logging, status transitions, level progression, and membership maintenance.

title: CPD Management
purpose: Tracking and enforcement of Continuing Professional Development requirements for certified auditors, including course submissions, approvals, and annual compliance.
business_value: Ensures auditors maintain professional competency through structured CPD tracking, firm approvals, and compliance monitoring.

title: Financial Management
purpose: Invoicing, payment processing, and financial integration for exam fees, membership fees, and firm reporting fees.
business_value: Provides seamless financial operations including invoice generation, payment processing, QuickBooks sync, and fee management.

title: User Identity & Access Control
purpose: Authentication, authorization, and role management for all platform users.
business_value: Secures platform access through MFA, role-based permissions, multi-role support, and profile validation.

title: Membership Management
purpose: Management of firm and individual membership status, categories, agreements, and annual renewals.
business_value: Enables APSCA to manage firm and individual membership lifecycle including status, categories, agreements, and renewal processing.

title: Firm Profile Management
purpose: Firm self-service capabilities for profile management, auditor associations, and accreditation tracking.
business_value: Empowers firms to manage their profiles, auditor associations, accreditations, and geographic coverage with self-service tools.

title: Reporting & Analytics
purpose: Dashboards, reports, and data visualization for internal stakeholders and external data sharing.
business_value: Provides real-time insights through dashboards, geographic visualizations, custom reports, and Metabase integration.

title: Data Governance & Security
purpose: Data protection, audit trails, retention policies, and system security.
business_value: Ensures data integrity, security compliance, and operational resilience through audit trails, encryption, retention, and incident response.

title: External Integrations & APIs
purpose: Integrations with external systems and APIs for partner data exchange and public information publishing.
business_value: Enables automated partner verification, LMS data exchange, public register embeds, and support ticket integration.

title: Ethics & Compliance
purpose: Management of ethics cases and compliance monitoring workflows.
business_value: Supports ethical governance through case management and compliance data tracking (requires dedicated discovery).
